text: Alexandre Mendy (born 20 March 1994) is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward for Caen. ==Club career== A youth product of OGC Nice, Mendy was loaned six months in 2014 to semi-professional club Strasbourg to gain more playing time. He was again loaned eight months later to Ligue 2 side Nîmes, where he made his full professional in September 2014, in a 2–0 Ligue 2 defeat against Gazélec Ajaccio. On 21 June 2016, Mendy signed for Ligue 1 side Guingamp. The transfer fee was estimated at between €600,000 and 1 million. In June 2017, Mendy moved to league rivals Girondins de Bordeaux signing a four- year deal. ==Personal life== Mendy is of Senegalese descent.
